title: Ethnopharmacological and scientific validation of Caryota mitis Lour fruit peel for osteoarthritis and gout management.
abstract: Traditional medicine in Vietnam has long utilized Caryota mitis Lour fruit peel to relieve joint pain, back pain, and inflammation. Despite its widespread use, scientific validation of its therapeutic effects remains limited. The application of the fruit peel in disease treatment is largely based on anecdotal evidence, highlighting the need for rigorous scientific research to substantiate its efficacy and elucidate its mechanisms of action.
